title: Grateful Dead Live at Capital Centre on 1991-03-20
lineage: The Master Cassettes were played back with Azimuth adjustment and Dolby B decoding on a Nakamichi CD1 into a Korg MR1000 at DSF 1 bit 5.6MHz. Subsequent conversion to 24/96 AIFF done via Korg Audiogate software. Redbook CDR standard 16/44.1 files were created using Bias Peak, Izotope Ozone's MBIT+ (for all dithering), and Weiss Saracon SRC (all sample rate conversions).
source: 3 Nakamichi CM300s/CP4s>Nakamichi 550 w/Maxell XLIIS cassette masters. Dolby B was used on the Master Cassettes. Official Taping Section 8 foot stand (Sec. 128 Row A Seat 4)
